proposal: Hi there, Halloween Inu community! Looks like you've managed to gather a spooky-good crowd of 1298 holders, and that's no trick, it's a treat! 🎃 As you aim to reach for the stars, our B2B tools might just be the rocket fuel you need. From creating your own DEX to launching a blockchain-based lottery, we can help add some boo-tiful utilities to your project. See my profile for demo and details.
